properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , NICKNAME , POSTAL_CODE , ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_DEL_DATE , MEM_DEL_DETAIL , MEM_BLOCK , MEM_IMG FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , NICKNAME , POSTAL_CODE , ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO PETSROOM ( MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL )
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_TEL = ? , NICKNAME = ? , POSTAL_CODE = ? , ADDRESS = ? , DETAIL_ADDRESS = ? , MEM_IMG = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , NICKNAME , POSTAL_CODE , ADDRESS , DETAIL_ADDRESS , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_DEL_DATE , MEM_DEL_DETAIL , MEM_BLOCK , MEM_IMG FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = ?
SELECT MEM_EMAIL FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_TEL = ?
